Our Services

Discover what you can do at Booklister...

Book Management

The administrator can perform the following actions:

  • 🚩 Create new books
  • 🚩 View the complete list of books
  • 🚩 Update information of existing books
  • 🚩 Delete books from the database
Access Book Management

User Management

The administrator can assign roles to users:

  • 🚩 Create new users
  • 🚩 View list of registered users
  • 🚩 Grant user or administrator permissions
Access User Management
